data.title: La Punilla hydroelectric plant
data.meta_description: La Punilla hydroelectric plant (Central Hidroeléctrica La Punilla) is a shelved hydroelectric power plant in San Fabián de Alico, Ñuble, Biobío Region, Chile.
data.text:
Part of the

Global Hydropower Tracker,

a Global Energy Monitor project.

La Punilla hydroelectric plant (Central Hidroeléctrica La Punilla) is a shelved hydroelectric power plant in San Fabián de Alico, Ñuble, Biobío Region, Chile.

Project Details

Table 1: Project details for La Punilla hydroelectric plant

Status Nameplate capacity Technology type Shelved[1] 94 MW[2] Conventional storage[3]

Location

Table 2: Location details for La Punilla hydroelectric plant

Location Coordinates (WGS 84) San Fabián de Alico, Ñuble, Biobío Region, Chile[2] -36.5193, -71.5861 (approximate)[2]
